verbose_text: However, their roles are different in that the sulfenylation of cysteine 251 in the HC (X) 4 EXV motif upregulates the stability and activity of phosphatase PP2Ac.This controversial role of sulfenylation could be due to the structure difference between two types of phosphatases.
evidence: HC(X)4 EXV motif upregulates the stability and activity of phosphatase
